Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.facebook.rendercore.MountDelegateInput
    Marked for removal; check out D4182567 for context.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.facebook.litho.internal.ArraySet
    This collection uses SimpleArrayMap as backing array which static cache can be corrupted when used in multi-threaded environment. When static cache gets corrupted, next time instance is used it can crash with ClassCastException even if that instance is thread confined.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert
    Use LithoAssertions which provides entry points to all Litho AssertJ helpers.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.LegacyLithoAssertions
    Use LithoAssertions which provides entry points to all Litho AssertJ helpers.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.LithoViewSubComponentDeepExtractor
    Use LithoViewAssert#containsComponent) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.LithoViewSubComponentExtractor
    Use LithoViewAssert#containsComponent) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.SubComponentDeepExtractor
    Use LithoViewAssert#containsComponent) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.SubComponentExtractor
    Use LithoViewAssert#containsComponent) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.TestComponent
    Use ComponentAssert APIs instead. Because this isn't generated with codegen, it can have subtle issues in tests.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestComponent
    Component should not be directly subclassed, write a layout spec or mount spec instead
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestDrawableComponent
    Use MountSpecLifecycleTester if lifecycle assertions are needed or SimpleMountSpecTester if not.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestLayoutComponent
    Component should not be directly subclassed, write a layout spec or mount spec instead
    com.facebook.litho.TestLayoutState
    Only to be used with the deprecated ComponentTestHelper
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestSizeDependentComponent
    Component should not be directly subclassed, write a layout spec or mount spec instead
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestTransitionComponent
    Component should not be directly subclassed, write a layout spec or mount spec instead
    com.facebook.litho.testing.TestViewComponent
    Component should not be directly subclassed, write a layout spec or mount spec instead
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TransparencyEnabledCard
    com.facebook.litho.ViewCompatComponent
    ViewCompatComponent is not efficient as it will do measurement of views twice. Recommended way now is to use either ViewRenderInfo (which utilizes same interfaces as this class: ViewCreator and ViewBinder) if the view is used with sections API or create a custom MountSpec.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.facebook.litho.annotations.ImportantForAccessibility.IMPORTANT_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY_YES_HIDE_DESCENDANTS
    prefer to add an intermediate child with IMPORTANT_FOR_ACCESSIBILITY_NO_HIDE_DESCENDANTS instead

    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, String)
    Use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, String)
    Use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocus(EventTrigger)
    Use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocus(EventTrigger)
    Use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.clearFocusTrigger(ComponentContext, String)
    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use EditText.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle).
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.clearFocusTrigger(ComponentContext, String)
    Do not use this method to get a EventTrigger to use later. Instead give the component a Handle and use TextInput.clearFocus(ComponentContext, Handle).
    com.facebook.litho.widget.EditText.Builder.clearFocusTrigger(EventTrigger)
    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of EditText.clearFocusTrigger that takes a Handle param.
    com.facebook.litho.widget.TextInput.Builder.clearFocusTrigger(EventTrigger)
    Do not use this method to set an EventTrigger. Instead, set a Handle on this Component with .handle() and dispatch the trigger using the variant of TextInput.clearFocusTrigger that takes a Handle param.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.containsOnlySubComponents(SubComponent...)
    Use LithoViewAssert#hasExactly(int, Class) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.containsSubComponent(SubComponent)
    Use ComponentAssert.extractingSubComponents(com.facebook.litho.ComponentContext) instead.
    com.facebook.litho.Border.Builder.cornerEffect(float)
    Please use Border.Builder.radiusPx(int) instead

    kept around for old code, you should create a real instance instead with `calculate`

    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.retainAll(Collection<?>)
    com.facebook.litho.testing.InteractionUtil.scrollTo(RecyclerView, int)
    as it is based on RecyclerView#computeVerticalScrollOffset() which only returns estimated scroll position, which may lead to the method hanging forever (or until hitting max iterations count) Please, consider using InteractionUtil.Scroller instead
    com.facebook.litho.specmodels.internal.ImmutableList.set(int, E)

    Use LithoView.setComponentAsync(Component) if reconciliation can be enabled.

    Use LithoView.setComponent(Component) if reconciliation can be enabled.

    com.facebook.rendercore.MountDelegate.unregisterMountExtension(MountExtension)
    Only used for Litho's integration. Marked for removal.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.willNotRender()
    see ComponentAssert.wontRender()
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.willRender()
    Use LithoViewAssert.willRenderContent() that will check if the root component won't return null or a child with height and width equal to 0
    com.facebook.litho.Component.willRender(ComponentContext, Component)
    Using willRender is regarded as an anti-pattern, since it will load all classes into memory in order to potentially decide not to use any of them.
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.withStateUpdate(StateUpdatesTestHelper.StateUpdater)
    com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert.wontRender()
    Use LithoViewAssert.willNotRenderContent() ()} that will check if the root component will return null or a child with width oir height equal to 0

  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    com.facebook.litho.annotations.ShouldUpdate.onMount
    this param is ignored. MountSpecs with pureRender will now always check shouldUpdate on the main thread if the information from layout isn't able to be used.
